application.doc: Generating a self-signed personal certificate in a certificate database

method.name: POST
method.doc: To complete this operation with RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the SSL Certificates personal certificate resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: operation
param.doc: The type of create operation to perform. In this case, the value is "generate".

param.name: label
param.doc: The new personal certificate label that is used to uniquely identify the personal certificate.

param.name: expire
param.doc: The validity period, in days, for the new certificate.

param.name: default
param.doc: Whether the generated certificate is the default. The value is "yes" or "no".

param.name: size
param.doc: The size of the new key pair to be created. Valid values are 1024, 2048 or 4096.

param.name: signature_algorithm
param.doc: The signature algorithm to use when creating the new certificate.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
